name: Neon dodger
description:
(This is a contribution to the Virtus Community Game Jam)

Neon Dodger is a fun little bullet hell that features you hovering above instable platforms, manipulating time, dodging bullets, lasers and bombs!

The character is controllable with WASD or the left stick on your controller.

This game was made inside of the Unreal Engine 4 by a small team of Students:

 Stefan Pohl - Programmer

Florian Mattern - Artist

Emese-Anna Hoppa - Artist
